item.description:
Before signing up for this event, please read and understand the entire Write-Up and the Liability Waiver. By signing up for this event you agree to the terms of the Liability Waiver.

Distance: 5.5 Miles

Duration: 2 hours

Diffuculty: Moderate

Blaze Orange: Not Required

Weetamoo Woods is owned by the town of Tiverton and the adjoining Pardon Gray Preserve is owned by the Tiverton Land Trust. Together they encompass over 680 acres. This hike will offer varied terrain and historic points of interest. The Weetamoo property is named for an Indian sachem from theÂ Pocasset Tribe during the time of King Philip's War. Pardon Gray was an officer in the Revolutionary War, he is buried in a small historic cemetery on the property. We will wander on old lanes and thriving forests.There is an old sawmill site and old stone bridges as well. There are some imposing rock outcroppings that we can climb for the views. There are many muddy areas on this hike. I strongly suggest sturdy boots, no sneakers.

Directions for the Providence area: Take Route 195 East into Fall River. Take Exit 8A to Mass 24 South into RI. Take the Fish Road Exit in Tiverton and take a left at the end of the exit onto Fish Rd. Follow Fish Rd 1.4 Miles to Bulgarmarsh Rd. Turn Right onto Bulgarmarsh Rd (RI 177) and follow for 1.0 Mile. Turn Left onto Main Rd (RI 177 South) and follow for 2.3 miles to the Tiverton Recrecation Area on the Left. There are two parking lots (North and South Lots) we will meet in the North lot.

Liability Waiver
As a condition of your voluntary participation in this activity you acknowledge and agree to the following: this activity involves inherent risks that can cause property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death to participants and/or others; you assume all risk associated with this activity; you are responsible for having the necessary knowledge, skills, abilities, clothing, and equipment to safely participate in this activity; you know and will follow the Hiker Responsibility Code described at www.hikesafe.com; the leader(s) of this activity are volunteers; and you for yourself, your heirs, executors, and administrators release, hold harmless, and indemnify the leader(s) and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death - including those caused by negligence and/or other reasons

Safety First!
item.how_to_find_us: Tiverton Town Farm Recreation Area, 3154-3588 Rhode Island 77, Tiverton, RI

group.name: Rhode Island Hiking Club " Walks and Rambles "

item.name: Weetamoo Woods, Weber Hike # 36
